phrs.translation: 孔融, 名字, 赌注

sentences.sentence: There have been various wagers on certain candidates since the senator announced his retirement.
sentences.translation: 自从那位参议员宣布引退之后，对某些候选人的打赌猜测纷纷出现。

sentences.sentence: With $3.5 billion being lost on Internet wagers this year, gambling has passed pornography as the Web's most profitable business.
sentences.translation: 今年由于有35亿美元输在网络赌博上，博彩业已经超过色情行业成为网上最有利可图的行业。

sentences.sentence: Why, you can use it to fund your wagers!
sentences.translation: 为什么，您可以使用它来基金，您的赌注！
